summary: “-just my name.” And perhaps that what hurts the most, the unintentional exclusion. Harry tries hard not feel hurt or jealous...
caption:
“-just my name.”

And perhaps that what hurts the most, the unintentional exclusion. Harry tries hard not feel hurt or jealous about it; he knew this day would come: Hermione and Ron, Ron and Hermione, like something of a natural progression–an eventuality without him. He tries really hard not to ruin it for them.

But it quite hurts.

reblog.comment:

But it quite hurts.

summary: The year is 2028, thirty years after the battle of Hogwarts. Most of the children of the trio, and others at the battle, have...
body:
The year is 2028, thirty years after the battle of Hogwarts. Most of the children of the trio, and others at the battle, have become adults. The trio and their friends have retired to a quiet life in unknown parts of the country. YHE is a character and personal plot driven site coupled with site-wide events and potential site-wide plots. 

Home | Alias Sorting | Face Claims | Job Claims | Want Ads | Discord

blog.description: ~Here you’ll find all type of fangirl’s stuff~

title: NO WOMAN (HARMIONE)
body:
No woman will love you as much as the one who:

sacraficed for you,

suffered for you,

cried for you

and even though she saw the worst of you…

She stayed.

💯fangirl

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

London is a battleground of chaos just daring her occupants to try and survive. War is relentless and intolerable, forcing brothers to fight brothers in a gory mess that threatens the very livelihood of community; and not just those possessing the gift of magic are in danger. While some dance in puddles of plasma, others cower in dark corners waiting for it all to end. No matter which side you choose, loss is inevitable while Lord Voldemort fights for control. Sometimes, it takes more than protocol to put an end to unnecessary bloodshed. It is in the rebels that we find hope and torn morals giving just about everyone a sense of unrest. They always did say fighting fire with fire never worked; but maybe a small spark will help bring an end to the rivalry.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

blog.name: trashyy-drarry
blog.title: Literal Trash
blog.description: 16 || Slytherin || Gay AF || INFP-T || Drarry || "Make me the star in every dream you have."

title: Drarry prompt one
body:
Listen to this song/read the lyrics (posted below) And try to write a short Drarry fanfic inspired by it!

https://youtu.be/7WktmdyLW0s

[Verse 1]
Darling I know, you only cry when you’re alone
Darling I know, you only laugh to keep it all in

[Pre-Chorus]
It’s scaring the both of us, the things that we’ve seen
The places we know we must go
But I’ve only loved one person through all

[Chorus]
Don’t need an apology to make it right
I just need you as a whole
Don’t want an apology to make it right
I want you in all of your glory
All of your glory

[Verse 2]
You know before me, the people that we
Were meant to be
But I’m only trying to be who I thought, you needed

[Pre-Chorus - Variation]
It’s killing the both of us, the place that we’re in
All the things we’ve come to
No amount of chaos can keep me from you

[Chorus]
Don’t need an apology to make it right
I just need you as a whole
Don’t want an apology to make it right
I want you in all of your glory

Don’t need an apology to make it right
I just need you as a whole
Don’t want an apology to make it right
I want you in all of your glory
All of your glory

[Outro]
Oh, all of your glory

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

War is relentless and intolerable, forcing brothers to fight brothers in a gory mess that threatens the very livelihood of community; and not just those possessing the gift of magic are in danger. While some dance in puddles of plasma, others cower in dark corners waiting for it all to end. No matter which side you choose, loss is inevitable while Lord Voldemort fights for control. Sometimes, it takes more than protocol to put an end to unnecessary bloodshed. It is in the rebels that we find hope and torn morals giving just about everyone a sense of unrest. They always did say fighting fire with fire never worked; but maybe a small spark will help bring an end to the rivalry.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

summary: “Tu l’hai mai letto Harry Potter? O il film, il film l’hai visto per forza.
body:
“Tu l’hai mai letto Harry Potter? O il film, il film l’hai visto per forza.

Ecco, c’è una scena incredibile, in cui, se non sbaglio, Harry chiede a Ron quali siano i lati negativi di hermione e lui lo guarda e tutto stizzito fa: “e’ saccente e orgogliosa e mi rimbecca sempre,” o qualcosa del genere. E allora Harry lo guarda e chiede: “e i lati negativi di Lavanda?” Ron alza gli occhi, in silenzio guarda altrove e dice sbottando “non è Hermione.”

Hai capito? A me viene già da ridere.

Sì, lo so, sono fatta così, io da tre frasi ci tiro giù sei pagine, ma che posso farci? Questa frase è vera, porca miseria! E allora va detto. Va detto che Ron, che poi di per sé è solo un personaggio, forse non si è reso conto di quello che ha detto, ma il modo di capirlo c’è eccome.

Quando c’è quella scena e lui dice, nel buio della stanza “lei non è Hermione” è come se dicesse “fai come ti pare, mettici in lei tutti i difetti del mondo, che mi da noia, che mi fa arrabbiare da morire, che a volte litighiamo, che sono geloso e che non lo dico mai, ma nessuna è come lei, non c’è verso di stare in pace se sto con un’altra.”

E’ un po’ come dire: “io posso trovare la persona migliore del mondo, ma nessuno si fa perdonare come sai fare tu. Nessuno se ne va nel modo in cui te ne vai tu perché quando se ne vanno gli altri io resto lì fermo a guardarli, tu invece mi fai venir voglia di correrti dietro, di gridare fortissimo “aspettami, non mi lasciare!” Gli altri se ne vanno e mi lasciano i ricordi, tu invece mi strappi via tutto il bene che ho in corpo.

E nessuno mi manca come te, perché gli altri mi mancano quando non ho nulla, tu invece mi manchi quando ho tutto. Io posso anche stare con una persona con cui combacio a pennello, ma continuo a preferire i tuoi spigoli e il modo in cui cozziamo.

Più della serenità fra gli altri, io preferisco litigare con te. Preferisco te con i tuoi difetti, perché nessuno mi guarda con i tuoi occhi. Nessuno, capito, nessuno ha quello sguardo lì che luccica, quel modo di vedere le cose con quel languore tutto tuo. Preferisco arrabbiarmi con te, più di tutti perché tu sai come abbracciarmi, dopo.

E allora capisci, non c’è pace se non è pace con te.

Non è bello se non sei te.

Io posso voler bene a chiunque, ma solo di te posso innamorarmi. Posso essere passionale con qualunque altra persona, ma solo con te so essere stupida. Non ce la faccio con nessun altro a ridere come faccio con te. Ron diceva proprio questo. diceva “posso guardare chiunque, mentre questo chiunque mi guarda di rimando, ma è più bello quando sei tu vicino a me, io ti guardo e tu non ti accorgi.”

E’ più bello con te.

E’ più bello se sei te.

Capito?

“Non è Hermione.”

tags: sorry for stealing your poem ginny
summary:
Pansy: Why are you crying, Draco?
Draco: Potter didn't like my poem
Pansy: Do you mean... that poem about Potter's eyes being as...
body:
Pansy: Why are you crying, Draco?
Draco: Potter didn't like my poem
Pansy: Do you mean... that poem about Potter's eyes being as green as a fresh pickled toad was yours?
Draco: I'm a great poet

dialogue.name: Pansy
dialogue.label: Pansy:
dialogue.phrase: Do you mean... that poem about Potter's eyes being as green as a fresh pickled toad was yours?
